explanatory_overlays.label: Entropy Rebound
explanatory_overlays.description: Entropy increased post-Week 24 due to immune compensation and lack of epithelial repair

explanatory_overlays.label: Entropy Stabilization
explanatory_overlays.description: Repair module + cytokine suppression logic kept system in homeostatic band (≤0.2)

notes: Entropy gain > 0.5 at Week 52 is associated with drug failure
SEI blueprint achieves continuous entropy reduction through layered intervention
Systemic predictability is a core metric of rescue success
